By Damion Cross on Wednesday, August 18, 2010 - 01:09 pm:

ok i know this prolly isn't the proper spot to talk about this....
but there are some inaccuracies with the numbers

first off, the move "charge" has a triangle for dmg, which is a one on the table, radius has a triangle for it's skill(hit rate) and that is a two on the table.... is there a reason it's like that, or is it a simple mistake

also, charge has nothing in crit, on the table it is put as one

By Thorr on Wednesday, August 18, 2010 - 01:32 pm:

Crit rate can never be 0. It may show blank on your screen, but it's always a minimum of 1.

The numbers are drawn from a different rating system and there are borderline crossovers. That's why I draw all the number values from the same source to make sure they are internally consistent.

By Damion Cross on Wednesday, August 18, 2010 - 02:38 pm:

mmk - thanks for clearing that up
